title.rendered: STEDI SHORT TYPE PUSH SWITCH TO SUIT NISSAN

content.rendered:
Nissann OEM Replacement Push Switches for NP300 Navara & Pathfinder Models that replaces the blank switches supplied in the cabin from factory for more relevant operational switches that are available in different prints depending on the attached device.

OVERVIEW

Suited to fit Nissan Navara NP300 (2015+ models), Pathfinder R52 (2012+ models) & X-Trail T32 (2014+ models). Available in 6 variants of print to replace blank switches located on the right hand side of the steering wheel. LED Light Bar, Spot Lights, Reverse Lights, Reverse Lights, Driving Lights and STEDI Universal prints available.

OPERATION

Simple On/Off function with dash & power illumination, text lighting up whilst the vehicles dash lights are active and icon when the chosen device is currently active. Orange backlit illumination.

OEM FITMENT

Complete OEM fitment with a clean finish to maintain the factory look to the inside of the cabin. Included wire tails and diagram for quick & easy installation.

DETAILS

STEDI’s new range of Nissan illuminated Push Button  suit Nissan vehicles listed below.

KEY FEATURES

  • Blue or Amber Led Back Lighting
  • Laser Etched print ensure our print will never rub off with use
  • Rated at 3A on 12v
  • Excellent OEM matching design

COMPATIBLE NISSAN MAKES

  • Pathfinder R52 | 2012 Current Current
  • Navara NP300| 2015 to Current
  • X-Trail T32 | 2014 to Current

If you have any blank in front of the cup holder on the NP300, our other Nissan switches can be used for these blanks

Please ensure a our switches are always wired through a fused relay.

SPECIFICATIONS

BACK LIGHT LED COLOUR Orange
SURFACE SIZE DIMENSIONS 30mmx23mm
RATED 3A @ 12v

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • Nissan Push Button Switch
  • Wiring Diagram

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI SHORT TYPE PUSH SWITCH TO SUIT NISSAN

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
